translation.en: This program is based on real events.
translation.it: Questa serie è basata su fatti reali,

translation.en: However, certain characters, names, incidents, locations, and dialogue
translation.it: ma alcuni personaggi, nomi, eventi, luoghi e dialoghi sono puramente casuali e inventati per scopi cinematografici.

translation.en: have been fictionalized for dramatic purposes.
translation.it: e dialoghi sono puramente casuali e inventati per scopi cinematografici.

translation.en: Sorry.
What wasn't fictionalized is that my son,
translation.it: A non essere stata inventata è la storia di mio figlio,

translation.en: at the age of 15, was prescribed OxyContin.
translation.it: a cui hanno prescritto l'OxyContin a 15 anni.

translation.en: He lived in years and years of addiction.
translation.it: Ha vissuto anni e anni di tossicodipendenza.

translation.en: And at the age of 32, he died,
translation.it: E a 32 anni è venuto a mancare,

translation.en: all alone in the freezing cold in a gas station parking lot.
translation.it: da solo al freddo di un parcheggio di un distributore.

translation.en: And we miss him.
What the fuck?
[guard] Sir! Sir! Don't do that, sir. Sir--
-No, I've got it. -No, let me do that, sir.
translation.it: - No, ci penso io! - No, faccio io, signore.

translation.en: There's 220 smoke alarms on the property.
translation.it: Ci sono 220 allarmi antincendio nella villa.

translation.en: -You know I can't sleep. -Oh, sir!
-Very important day. -Goodness.
-I'm so sorry, sir. -I need my rest.
I'm sorry about that. Just please let me do this, sir.
translation.it: Sono desolato. Ma lo faccia fare a me.

translation.en: Very big day. Dr. Richard needs his rest.
translation.it: È un giorno importante. Devo riposare.

translation.en: Why does this keep happening? I put batteries in once a month.
translation.it: Perché fa così? Cambio le pile una volta al mese.

translation.en: Well done, well done, well done.
-I'll put a new one up there. -Very good job. It's all right.
translation.it: - Ce ne metto uno nuovo. - Bravissimo. Tranquillo.

translation.en: Don't worry about that now. Just clean up the mess.
translation.it: Non ci pensare ora. Pulisci questo casino.

translation.en: Actually, would you mind checking the rest of them?
translation.it: Anzi, ti spiace controllare anche gli altri?

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Thank you for being here, Ms. Flowers. It means a lot to us.
translation.it: Grazie di essere venuta, sig.na Flowers. Significa molto.

translation.en: I'm Brianna Ortiz. This is my associate, Bill Havens.
translation.it: Sono Brianna Ortiz e lui è il mio socio Bill Havens.

translation.en: -An honor to meet you. -How do you do?
-May I call you Edie? -Ms. Flowers will do.
translation.it: - Posso chiamarti Edie? - Va bene sig.na Flowers.

translation.en: Of course. Everything all right with your flight?
translation.it: Certo. Il suo volo è andato bene?

translation.en: -It was fine. -Everything's good--?
We can cut the chitchat.
I recognize you're trying to be polite. I've made a note of it. Thank you.
translation.it: So che vuole essere gentile e lo è stata. Grazie.

translation.en: -Oh. I just see that you brought your-- -Yes. I changed my flight to 7:15.
translation.it: - Ho solo visto la sua… - Sì. Ho spostato il volo alle 19:15.

translation.en: I'm eager to be home.
But we have the next five hours, so let's make the most of it.
translation.it: Abbiamo cinque ore, sfruttiamole al meglio.

translation.en: -Where are we doing this? Great. -Just down the hall.
translation.it: - Dove andiamo? Perfetto. - In fondo al corridoio.

translation.en: What do you want to know?
[Brianna] We'll just get right into it. To the right.
-Welcome. -[Edie] Great.
Hello. Keep your seat.
[Brianna] All right.
As you probably already know,
every state and dozens of cities and counties are suing Purdue Pharma
translation.it: ogni stato e decine di città hanno fatto causa alla Purdue Pharma

translation.en: for their role in starting the opioid epidemic.
translation.it: per il contributo all'epidemia di oppioidi.

translation.en: It's hundreds of lawsuits that would take decades to resolve,
translation.it: Ci vorrebbero anni per risolvere centinaia di cause,

translation.en: so we've consolidated those lawsuits into a single case
translation.it: perciò le abbiamo unite in un unico caso

translation.en: that we believe will bring justice once and for all.
translation.it: per cui crediamo di ottenere giustizia.

translation.en: Justice? Okay.
[Brianna] We can't bring people back from the dead, but we can make these people pay.
translation.it: Non possiamo salvare i morti, ma possiamo far pagare i colpevoli.

translation.en: So not justice, payment.
I don't know why you need me for this.
translation.it: Non so perché vi servo io.

translation.en: You could come up with a number.
Pick the biggest number you can think of, they will pay it, you can call it a win.
translation.it: Scegliete quella più alta che vi viene in mente e la pagheranno.

translation.en: Ms. Flowers, you might find this frustrating,
and I know you've been through the wringer, but now isn't then.
translation.it: e so che ne ha passate tante, ma il presente è questo.

translation.en: We have good reason to be optimistic about the outcome.
[Bill] Why are you here?
-You don't look like you want to be. -I made a promise to someone.
translation.it: - Non sembra abbia voglia. - Ho fatto una promessa.

translation.en: But you have access to the same files I did.
translation.it: Ma avete accesso ai miei stessi fascicoli.

translation.en: You've seen everything I've seen.
translation.it: Avete visto ciò che ho visto io.

translation.en: We have. But I have quite a few questions I'd like to get through.
translation.it: Sì, ma ho ancora qualche domanda.

translation.en: Let's just start with one.
How do you think we got here?
What do I think?
I think you're wasting my time.
translation.it: Secondo me, sprecate il mio tempo.

translation.en: And yours.
I know how this ends. I've been here before.
translation.it: So come va a finire. Ci sono già passata.

translation.en: [Brianna on TV] Would you state your name?
Sir.
[Brianna] You are here today to give testimony in the civil case
translation.it: E oggi è qui per testimoniare nella causa civile

translation.en: pending against Purdue Pharma, makers of OxyContin.
translation.it: contro la Purdue Pharma, produttrice dell'OxyContin.

translation.en: Dr. Sackler, are you aware of that?
That is my understanding.
You deposed Richard Sackler?
[attorney] I want to make it clear that the appearance of Dr. Sackler here today
translation.it: Chiarisco che la testimonianza del dott. Sackler

translation.en: is on a voluntary basis.
How did you manage that?
That's it. Go ahead.
I told you, things are different now.
We're big-game hunting, no mid-level flunkies.
translation.it: Vogliamo il pesce grosso, non i tirapiedi.

translation.en: But we need your help to do it.
translation.it: Ma ci serve il suo aiuto.

translation.en: Was...
Was he sitting right here?
-I'm gonna need a different chair. -I'm sorry?
Just get me another chair.
Can you take that chair out of the room please?
Thank you.
-Okay, if you need a moment... -[Edie] No.
translation.it: - Ok, se le serve un attimo… - No.

translation.en: Well, what's next?
When did you first hear about OxyContin?
1998, because of an x-ray machine in Hillsville, Virginia.
translation.it: Nel 1998, grazie a una macchina a raggi X a Hillsville, in Virginia.

translation.en: Well, I am sorry to keep you waiting, Ms. Flowers.
So, what seems to be the problem?
Good morning, doctor. I need to see your GE 4225 portable x-ray.
translation.it: Salve. Vorrei vedere il suo sistema radiologico portatile GE 4225.

translation.en: -Oh, so you need an x-ray? -I don't need an x-ray.
You can put the clipboard down. I'm not a patient.
translation.it: Posi la cartellina. Non sono una paziente.

translation.en: Okay.
An appointment is the only way I can get your full attention.
translation.it: Ho dovuto prendere un appuntamento per parlarle.

translation.en: and now that I have that, I am Edie Flowers.
translation.it: Ora che ho la sua attenzione, sono Edie Flowers.

translation.en: I am an investigator with the U.S. attorney's office in Roanoke.
translation.it: Sono un'agente dell'Ufficio del Procuratore Federale di Roanoke.

translation.en: Part of my job is to track down doctors
translation.it: Il mio lavoro è scovare medici

translation.en: who bill Medicaid for procedures they don't perform.
translation.it: che richiedono il Medicaid per interventi che non fanno.

translation.en: That is fraud, not just to Medicaid, but the American taxpayer.
translation.it: Si chiama frode, soprattutto nei confronti dei contribuenti.

translation.en: Before you look at me like that,
trust me when I say it really is in your best interest
translation.it: si fidi, è nel suo miglior interesse

translation.en: to show me that x-ray machine.
Please and thank you.
Oh, boy. Yeah. Yeah, okay.
Yeah. There, uh-- There it is.
But I haven't done anything wrong.
translation.it: Ma non ho fatto niente di male.

translation.en: You billed Medicaid for 50 x-rays a day for 30 days straight.
translation.it: Ha richiesto il sussidio per 50 raggi al giorno per 30 giorni di fila.

translation.en: Not 49, not 51.
And at $107 per x-ray,
this clinic, which you own, earned $160,500.
translation.it: questa clinica, che è sua, ha guadagnato 160.500 dollari.

translation.en: Do I need to call my lawyer?
Why would you need a lawyer if you didn't do anything wrong?
translation.it: A che le serve se non ha fatto niente?

translation.en: -I'll pay it back. -You're gonna pay me back?
Well, whoever, I'll pay them back.
translation.it: A chi di pertinenza, li restituirò.

translation.en: Okay, look, I don't want to lose my practice over this. Please.
translation.it: Ok, senta. Non voglio perdere la licenza per questo. La prego.

translation.en: -There must be some way out of this. -Cooperate.
Okay. Okay, I will. Fine.
I need a copy of every invoice over the last two years
translation.it: Mi servono le fatture degli ultimi due anni.

translation.en: and I'll make copies of the files on your computers,
translation.it: Farò delle copie dei file sul suo PC

translation.en: and if there is anything else I should know, anything at all,
translation.it: e, se devo sapere altro, qualsiasi cosa,

translation.en: it's best you tell me now because if I find it,
translation.it: le conviene dirmelo subito perché, se lo scopro,

translation.en: it will make things much worse for you.
Is there anything else I should know?
-Nope. -You sure?
No. No, there is nothing.
There's nothing, I promise.
Then let's see those files.
[Edie] At first, the only way you heard about OxyContin
translation.it: CAROLINA DEL NORD All'inizio, sentivi parlare dell'OxyContin

translation.en: was if Purdue sent one of their reps to visit your local doctor...
translation.it: se la Purdue mandava un rappresentante dai medici locali…

translation.en: Chevy going hot. Get her off the lift.
[Edie] ...and you were unlucky enough to get hurt.
Damn, little quicker, huh?
Yeah!
Hey, good morning.
-Just having lunch. -[Glen] Little impromptu lunch, huh?
-[James] Absolutely. -What are you eating?
[Colby] Salami sandwich.
Yeah, so spare needs to be changed here.
translation.it: Sì, va cambiata la ruota di scorta.

translation.en: That hasn't been done. Chevy, get off the lift.
translation.it: Non è ancora stato fatto. Quella va tirata giù.

translation.en: -Finish your food and let's go. -[James] We'll get right on it.
translation.it: - Finite il panino e muovetevi. - Subito.

translation.en: Good job, guys. Really good start today.
translation.it: Bravi. Oggi avete iniziato alla grande.

translation.en: I mean, what the fuck?
-Ty! Ty! Ty! -[shouting]
Hey!
Hey! Pace it up!
You've done nothing in an hour.
translation.it: Non hai fatto niente in un'ora!

translation.en: All these engines came out of nowhere and I don't know what to do with them.
translation.it: Ci sono un sacco di motori e non so cosa farci!

translation.en: This isn't a junkyard we're doing.
Let's get the engines in the bin. I need you in the shop.
translation.it: Buttali nel cassonetto e vieni in officina.

translation.en: -I will, I will. -Pull focus.
-Okay! All right! -Here we go.
-I believe in you, man. -I believe in me too.
translation.it: - Ce la puoi fare. - Ce la posso fare.

translation.en: Hey, Mike. Sorry to keep you waiting.
Let's get you closed up.
Thanks for waiting, huh?
Come on in.
-Hey, hon. Mike wants to close up. -Hi. Hi, Mike.
translation.it: - Amore. Mike deve saldare. - Ciao. Ciao, Mike.

translation.en: -Hey! -[Glen] Hi!
-Okay, that comes to... -[Glen] Oh, who is it?
...167 total.
[Glen] Yeah. Hold on.
Things have been slow down at the shop so I appreciate the discount.
translation.it: Gli affari vanno male, perciò grazie dello sconto.

translation.en: -[Lily] Oh. No problem. -Discount, hon?
Yeah. You know, that, uh...
You know Maggie left me?
Oh, shoot.
-I did not know that. -Yeah, she took everything but the truck.
translation.it: - Non lo sapevo. - Sì, ha preso tutto tranne il furgone.

translation.en: -Yeah, she took the house. -Oh, yeah?
She took the dog. She had it attack me when I went to get my shoes.
translation.it: Il cane, che mi ha scagliato contro mentre riprendevo le scarpe.

translation.en: You know Rhonda who works at the Chevrolet dealership?
translation.it: Avete presente Rhonda che lavora alla Chevrolet?

translation.en: -[Glen] I know Rhonda. -Not at the front desk.
Uh, that's who she left me for.
Okay.
-How we doing? -That was intense.
-The discount with Mike? -Oh, come on, he's so sad.
translation.it: - E quello sconto? - Dai, Mike è così triste.

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -[Glen] Emotional discounts. I don't know.
translation.it: Sconti per compassione. - Non mi piacciono. - Gomme Kryger.

translation.en: Oh, fantastic. Thank you so much. Okay.
-Um-- -What?
Your Accu-turn tire thingy from Italy arrived and is gonna clear Customs
translation.it: Le gomme Accu-Turn dall'Italia sono arrivate

translation.en: -and get dropped off today at 5:00, yeah. -Italy. Nice.
translation.it: - e ce le consegnano alle 17. - Dall'Italia. Bene.

translation.en: How much did that run us?
What was it, like, eight grand?
Eight thousand dollars?
You're the one who wanted a fancy Italian one.
translation.it: Sei tu che le hai volute italiane.

translation.en: I don't even know what it does.
Honey, just because I want something for $8,000,
translation.it: Solo perché voglio una cosa da 8.000 dollari,

translation.en: doesn't mean you're supposed to pull the trigger on it.
translation.it: non significa che tu debba comprarla.

translation.en: You're joking, right? You're actually joking.
-I'm gonna kick you in your-- Oh, my God. -You're running the books.
translation.it: - Ti sto per… Oddio. - Sei tu l'amministratrice.

translation.en: -Yeah? -I'm going to kill you.
So, we don't like college, huh?
No college.
There goes your college fund.
-Okay. Okay. -Daddy's being mean.
-I love you. -You just go and do your thing out there.
This was supposed to be done yesterday, guys.
Get it out, it's ready.
Motherfucker.
-Take them off! Take them off! -Why?
-Come on. -Listen to me.
-I'm fucking around. -Yeah, exactly.
-You're fucking around. No more. -Glen.
Do you know how a T-Rex says hi?
translation.it: Sai come dice ciao un T-Rex?

translation.en: Stop fucking around. Hey. Stop. Stop.
-Stop. -Do you know how the T-Rex eats?
translation.it: - Basta. - Sai come mangia un T-Rex?

translation.en: -It goes... -Get the fuck out.
Let's go. Turn it off.
-Turn it the f-- -Ah!
-Hey, shut it down. -[Tyler] I can't understand you.
translation.it: - Ehi, finiscila. - Non ti sento. Spegnilo! Basta!

translation.en: Shut it down! No more.
-Hey, get out. -Come on, man.
-I'm just fucking around. -Get out.
-I can do it. Come on. -Stop fucking around.
-I gave you a warning. Did I not? -Yes, you did.
translation.it: - Ti avevo avvisato o no? - Sì.

translation.en: Okay, so what happened?
translation.it: Ok, e tu che hai fatto?

translation.en: Nothing happened. You're screwing around.
-Turn the machine off, get in the shop. -I took the music off! Listen--
translation.it: - Ora spegni il motore e vieni dentro. - Ho tolto le cuffie.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
-[shouts] Fuck. -Are you okay? Are you okay?
What is going on?
He fell-- And then the rotator-- -He fell off onto the ground. -Are you okay?
-[Tyler] Glen, I'm so sorry man, I... -[Glen] Oh, fuck.
[Lily] Do you think you can get up? Grab my shoulder.
translation.it: Riesci ad alzarti? Appoggiati a me.

translation.en: -My back. There's something in my back. -Okay.
-Let's try and stand up. -Let's try to get up.
[Tyler] I'm so sorry.
-I was just fucking around. -Slow.
-[Tyler] I didn't mean to throw you off. -Ready? One, two, three, come on.
translation.it: - Non volevo spingerti. - Uno, due, tre, su.

translation.en: -[screaming] Oh, fuck! -Put him down, put him down!
[Lily] Okay, go call an ambulance.
-[James] Jesus Christ. -[Glen] My back. Oh, fuck.
translation.it: Cristo santo! La schiena, porca troia.

translation.en: [surgeon] Retractor.
Next, please.
Suction. There's the ligament damage.
All right, it's out. There's the bone fragment.
translation.it: Bene, l'ho tolto. Il frammento osseo.

translation.en: I spoke with your surgeon. He said home run, everything was great.
translation.it: Ho parlato col tuo chirurgo e ha detto che è andato tutto bene.

translation.en: -So now... -Awesome.
...pay attention.
[in German accent] We have to get out of the bed time unt into the med time.
translation.it: Ora devi scendere dal letto und prendere le medicine.

translation.en: Right? Pay attention. We have the muscle relaxer.
translation.it: Va bene? Ascoltate. C'è un miorilassante.

translation.en: That's right.
-We have the steroid for the inflammation. -Okay.
Unt we have the Vicodin for the pain.
translation.it: Und il Vicodin per il dolore.

translation.en: Thank you.
-With food? -With food. Yeah!
Schnitzel from the pig!
[Lily] Okay.
[in normal voice] So, I will see you next week for a checkup.
translation.it: Ci rivediamo tra una settimana per un controllo.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, the 25th.
Glen, you did good. Everything's gonna be fine.
translation.it: Glen, sei stato bravo. Andrà bene.

translation.en: -Thanks, Dr. Hartman. -Bye, gang.
Richard attached himself to an endless supply of customers,
translation.it: Richard ha avuto un'infinità di clienti,

translation.en: people in pain, and people with no option other than to get better.
translation.it: persone in preda al dolore e che desideravano stare meglio.

translation.en: Try lifting the feet up, both at a time. Up.
translation.it: Prova ad alzare entrambi i piedi. Su.

translation.en: It's a little more difficult. A little more advanced. And holding.
translation.it: È un po' più difficile. Ora tieni.

translation.en: Breathing. Again. Inhale, exhale.
-Lower the legs maybe two inches. -[Glen] This sucks.
Why is that so painful?
[woman] The muscles are stretching when you do that, okay?
translation.it: Perché i muscoli si allungano quando lo fai, ok?

translation.en: Relax. Excellent. Let's try something different.
translation.it: Rilassati. Bene. Proviamo un altro esercizio.

translation.en: -And 90 degrees, holding. -[Glen] Easy, please.
[woman] Gently lowering them down a few inches.
And, breathe, breathe, breathe.
-Keeping the back down, flat. -God, this fucking sucks.
translation.it: - Appoggia bene la schiena. - Dio, che palle.

translation.en: -[woman] Push on my hands. -I can't.
translation.it: - Spingi su di me. - Non ci riesco.

translation.en: [woman] Okay, okay. I know it's frustrating, but you got it.
translation.it: Ok. Capisco che sia frustrante, ma ce la farai.

translation.en: You're doing well. Doing really well. This is a long process.
translation.it: Stai andando benissimo. Il processo è lungo.

translation.en: [Glen] Uh, yeah.
[woman] I've seen a lot of cases like yours,
translation.it: Ho visto molti casi come il tuo,

translation.en: and you have to know that this is something you're living with now, okay?
translation.it: devi capire che ormai devi conviverci, ok?

translation.en: [Glen] Okay.
This is your new reality. And draw the knees up.
translation.it: È la tua nuova realtà. Alza le ginocchia.

translation.en: Let's try five more.
-All the way up. Five more. -Okay.
This isn't just about a pill that killed a lot of people.
translation.it: Non è solo una pillola che ha ucciso migliaia di persone.

translation.en: It's bigger than that.
No, this thing, this plague,
it started when someone in that family
translation.it: è iniziata quando qualcuno in quella famiglia

translation.en: realized that the big money in medicine was in sales and marketing.
translation.it: ha capito che i veri soldi stavano nella vendita delle medicine.

translation.en: And lies.
-You're referring to Arthur Sackler? -[Edie] Yeah.
Arthur Sackler started this whole thing.
translation.it: Arthur Sackler ha dato inizio a tutto.

translation.en: He was a psychiatrist at the eve of the pharmaceutical revolution.
translation.it: Era uno psichiatra all'avvento della rivoluzione farmaceutica.

translation.en: In those days, the go to move in mental health was a lobotomy.
translation.it: A quei tempi, la lobotomia era pratica comune.

translation.en: But lobotomies are a one-shot deal.
No repeat customers.
Arthur realized with the right pill, he'd have a customer for life.
translation.it: Arthur capì che con la pillola giusta avrebbe avuto clienti a vita.

translation.en: And he branded the new pill...
translation.it: E così pubblicizzò la nuova pillola…

translation.en: A lobotomy in a bottle.
[Edie] He found out he was a better salesman than a doctor,
translation.it: Era più bravo come venditore che come medico,

translation.en: so he went out and bought himself two things:
a drug company
and the country's largest medical advertising agency.
translation.it: e l'agenzia pubblicitaria di farmaci più grande del Paese.

translation.en: He knew that marketing was the future of pills
translation.it: Sapeva che il futuro dei farmaci era nelle pubblicità

translation.en: and he hit the jackpot when they got the contract for Valium,
translation.it: e fece tombola quando firmò il contratto per il Valium,

translation.en: creating the world's first blockbuster drug.
translation.it: dando vita a un farmaco di successo mondiale.

translation.en: [Arthur] The drug you never knew you needed.
translation.it: Il farmaco di cui hai bisogno.

translation.en: [Edie] And then he was rich and he wanted everyone to know it.
translation.it: Era ricco e voleva che tutti lo sapessero.

translation.en: He bought a bunch of old, fancy art.
He put his name on any museum, school or hospital that would take his money,
translation.it: Dette il nome a musei, scuole e ospedali previa donazione,

translation.en: and they all did.
I think it made him feel immortal.
To him, legacy was everything.
[all] Sackler!
[Edie] He lorded that legacy over his whole family,
translation.it: La sua famiglia ne sentiva il peso

translation.en: and like a lot of families of really rich people,
translation.it: e, come tutte le famiglie delle persone benestanti,

translation.en: they couldn't wait for him to die.
They wouldn't have to wait long.
-Excuse me. -Yes?
I need to speak to a doctor.
[nurse] Sir, you need to sign in first over there.
[Edie] On May 26, 1987, he drove himself to the emergency room
translation.it: Il 26 maggio 1987, guidò fino al pronto soccorso

translation.en: at Columbia Presbyterian Hospital and announced:
translation.it: del Columbia Presbyterian Hospital e disse…

translation.en: My name is Dr. Arthur Sackler. I'm having a heart attack.
translation.it: Sono il dott. Arthur Sackler e ho un infarto in corso.

translation.en: I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.it: Ho l'arteria discendente posteriore sinistra ostruita.

translation.en: I need a balloon angioplasty right now or I won't survive.
translation.it: Mi serve subito un'angioplastica o morirò.

translation.en: [nurse] Okay, let's start from the top. Let's start from the top. Sir?
-I'm Dr. Arthur Sackler. -[nurse] Sir, I need you to come back.
translation.it: - Sono il dott. Arthur Sackler. - Torni qui.

translation.en: I'm having a heart attack.
I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.it: Ho l'arteria discendente posteriore sinistra ostruita.

translation.en: I need a balloon angioplasty now or I won't survive.
translation.it: Mi serve subito un'angioplastica o morirò.

translation.en: [doctor] I'm gonna need you to calm down for a minute.
Sir? Where are you--? Sir? Nurse!
[nurse] Some help here.
Stop wasting time.
I have a blockage of my proximal left anterior descending artery.
translation.it: Ho l'arteria discendente anteriore sinistra ostruita.

translation.en: I need the angio-- [doctor] Let's see what the EKG has to say.
Stop wasting time. Do what I say.
-[doctor] You're doing great. -[grunts]
[doctor] Well, it looks like-- Hey, you were right.
Yeah, I'm always fucking right.
Oh, boy.
[nurse] Time of death 7:58 p.m.
[Edie] Arthur may have created the modern pharmaceutical business
translation.it: Arthur aveva creato l'industria farmaceutica moderna

translation.en: and made the family millions, but it was his nephew, Richard,
translation.it: e aveva guadagnato milioni, ma fu il nipote Richard

translation.en: who unleashed a monster...
Right this way, Dr. Sackler.
[Edie] ...and made them billions.
It would take 10 years,
but... I think the passing of some mantle from Arthur to Richard
translation.it: ma credo che il passaggio di testimone da Arthur a Richard

translation.en: was the beginning of OxyContin.
And now that Arthur was out of the picture,
Richard had a plan.
But first he needed one key ingredient,
translation.it: Ma prima gli serviva un ingrediente fondamentale

translation.en: and the only thing that stood in his way was a big dysfunctional family.
translation.it: e l'unica cosa che lo intralciava era una grande famiglia disfunzionale.

translation.en: -What's the point of talking about this? -How long is this going to take?
-Stanley, we need to know what's going on. -Let him talk!
We're trying! Goddamn it, Stanley, what are we getting?
translation.it: Ci stiamo provando! Cazzo, cosa ereditiamo?

translation.en: It seems that Arthur hypothecated a great deal of art and money over the years.
translation.it: Arthur aveva ipotecato molte opere d'arte e denaro negli anni.

translation.en: What the hell does "hypothecated" mean?
It means he owes money. And not just money, art.
translation.it: Significa che è in debito. Di denaro e opere d'arte.

translation.en: There are some sizable debts to Harvard, the Met, the Smithsonian, Columbia...
translation.it: Ci sono debiti con Harvard, il MET, lo Smithsonian, la Columbia…

translation.en: And who's going to pay that?
[Stanley] Well, Arthur had several businesses and he added your names to many of them.
translation.it: Arthur gestiva parecchie aziende e ve ne aveva intestate molte.

translation.en: -All right, which businesses? -[Stanley] Okay. [clears throat]
Uh, Douglas McAdams, Medical Tribune International,
Napp Pharmaceuticals, MD publications...
-Have you--? -I've never heard of--
...Medimetriks, Purdue Frederick MRS, IMS, MSCDC.
I haven't heard of any of these businesses.
[Stanley] Your names are all over them.
I suggest you liquidate to pay these debts because, as I said, they are sizable.
translation.it: Vi consiglio di venderle per sanare i debiti o ve le confischeranno.

translation.en: -Stanley, was Dad broke? -No, no, no. Well, maybe.
translation.it: - Papà era al verde? - No. Cioè, forse.

translation.en: -Take Purdue. -That's a terrible idea.
translation.it: - Prendi la Purdue. - È una pessima idea.

translation.en: They're going to divide it all up so that we get little pieces? No.
translation.it: Vogliono dividersela e lasciarci le briciole? No.

translation.en: Give them everything and exchange it for Purdue.
translation.it: Dagli tutto in cambio della Purdue.

translation.en: Purdue's got only one drug that's worth anything, MS Contin.
translation.it: La Purdue ha un solo farmaco che vale qualcosa, l'MS Contin.

translation.en: Right now, it's a niche drug for people who are dying of cancer.
translation.it: Ed è un farmaco di nicchia per malati di cancro.

translation.en: When the patent runs out, we got fuck all.
translation.it: Se scade il brevetto, siamo fregati.

translation.en: You were in there, you got fuck all now.
Purdue is a real company, bought by you and Arthur.
translation.it: La Purdue è una vera azienda, comprata da voi e Arthur.

translation.en: They actually make something. Those people in there don't understand.
translation.it: Produce qualcosa. Quelli là dentro non ci capiscono niente.

translation.en: They've never made anything in their entire lives except fucking chitchat.
translation.it: Non hanno mai fatto un cazzo nella vita.

translation.en: No! No! We're not gonna--
We'll let them eat canapés, we'll make something.
translation.it: Facciamo qualcosa, mentre loro mangiano tartine.

translation.en: Yeah, but you've never brought a drug to market, son.
translation.it: Sì, ma non hai mai rilasciato un farmaco sul mercato.

translation.en: It takes a decade, and we've got nothing in the pipeline.
translation.it: Servono dieci anni e non abbiamo niente.

translation.en: -It's a dead end. -We know pain.
Yeah, that's for damn sure.
We developed MS Contin, we understand pain.
translation.it: Abbiamo sviluppato l'MS Contin, sappiamo cos'è il dolore.

translation.en: I understand pain.
All of human behavior is essentially comprised of two things:
translation.it: L'essere umano segue solo due istinti:

translation.en: running away from pain and toward pleasure.
translation.it: scappa dal dolore e rincorre il piacere.

translation.en: It's a cycle.
Run from pain, run toward pleasure.
translation.it: Scappiamo dal dolore, rincorriamo il piacere.

translation.en: Pain, pleasure, pain, pleasure.
Again and again.
Well, this circle is our existence.
translation.it: Questo ciclo è la nostra esistenza.

translation.en: It is the very essence of what it means to be human, to be alive.
translation.it: È l'essenza dell'essere umano, dell'essere vivo.

translation.en: But if we place ourselves right there, between pain and pleasure...
translation.it: Ma, se ci posizioniamo tra dolore e piacere…

translation.en: If we become the gatekeepers for everyone who wants to get away from pain,
translation.it: Se diventiamo i mediatori di chi vuole scappare dal dolore,

translation.en: then we have changed the world.
We finish what Arthur started.
And you will never have to worry about money ever again.
translation.it: Non dovremo più preoccuparci dei soldi.

translation.en: -Fuck yeah. -Yeah.
[Bill] Purdue goes on to develop one of the most powerful painkillers
translation.it: La Purdue sviluppa uno dei più potenti antidolorifici

translation.en: to ever hit the market, while telling us it's perfectly safe.
translation.it: del mercato, dicendoci che è del tutto sicuro.

translation.en: Besides money, what do you think motivated Sackler?
translation.it: A parte i soldi, perché Sackler l'ha fatto?

translation.en: Napoleon was short, so he conquered Europe.
translation.it: Napoleone era basso, perciò ha conquistato l'Europa.

translation.en: Batman's Batman because his parents got killed.
translation.it: Batman è Batman per via dei genitori.

translation.en: -Is that what you're asking? -Yeah.
In college, he tried inventing a pill that could give you an orgasm.
translation.it: Al college, provò a creare un farmaco in grado di darti un orgasmo.

translation.en: He loved vacationing in Thailand.
translation.it: Amava andare in vacanza in Tailandia.

translation.en: His favorite vegetable is the asparagus, and I don't give a shit the motivation.
translation.it: Ama gli asparagi. Che cazzo me ne frega della motivazione!

translation.en: It doesn't matter because he did it.
I'm sure even if you knew the reason, it wouldn't make you feel any better.
translation.it: Se sapessimo il motivo, non staremmo meglio.

translation.en: What about you, Ms. Flowers?
What motivated you?
The only thing I had: work.
translation.it: L'unica cosa che avevo: il lavoro.

translation.en: That's it? Just work?
Just work.
[Edie] Yes, yes, yes!
♪ Shake your tambourine and blow... ♪
Fuck! Come on.
Shit.
Shit, shit, shit.
[operator] You have reached the Tomb Raider helpline. -The charge is two d-- -[keypad beeping]
translation.it: Assistenza di Tomb Raider. I costi…

translation.en: -Hi, it's Edie. -[man] Hello, Ms. Edie. How are you?
translation.it: - Salve, sono Edie. - Salve, sig.na Edie.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm about two minutes into Level 14.
translation.it: Ho iniziato da due minuti il livello 14.

translation.en: In Atlantis, in the pool room, and I don't know how to get through it.
translation.it: Sono ad Atlantide nella piscina, ma non so come uscirne.

translation.en: I've died 16 times.
Hello?
You need to move across the space two times.
translation.it: Deve spostarsi nello spazio due volte.

translation.en: -First, you spring the traps. -Hang on. Mm-hm.
-Then you get out of the-- -Okay. I got it.
translation.it: - E poi deve uscire… - Ok, ci sono.

translation.en: Well done. Now turn to your left, climb the tallest block and jump to the...
translation.it: Bene. Ora giri a sinistra, scali il sasso più alto e salti…

translation.en: There's a dragon up ahead at the third column.
translation.it: C'è un drago davanti alla terza colonna.

translation.en: -Thank you. -My pleasure, Ms. Edie.
-If there's anything else I can do... -No.
I'm good. Good night.
Or good morning, wherever you are.
translation.it: O buongiorno, non so dove sta.

translation.en: I am a bureaucrat.
Bureaucracy is what holds us together.
translation.it: La burocrazia è ciò che ci tiene uniti.

translation.en: It's what keeps society organized, functioning, moving.
translation.it: Tiene la società organizzata, funzionante e in moto.

translation.en: There's no civilization without bureaucracy.
Spreadsheets are what keep the world from collapsing, and...
translation.it: I documenti evitano che il mondo collassi e…

translation.en: I was good at my job.
♪ Chuck baby don't give a what... ♪
translation.it: Chuck baby don't give a what…

translation.en: I'll need a copy of every invoice over the last two years.
translation.it: Mi servono le fatture degli ultimi due anni.

translation.en: Green for legitimate charges.
Anything else you think I should know?
Yellow for fraudulent charges I was already aware of,
translation.it: Giallo per le accuse di frode di cui ero a conoscenza

translation.en: and red, red is when I was lied to.
translation.it: e rosso per quando mi mentono.

translation.en: -There is nothing. -You sure?
I promise.
♪ Chuck baby don't give a... ♪
When the red came out, that tended to turn things fun for me.
translation.it: Quando tiravo fuori il rosso, iniziavo a divertirmi.

translation.en: By 1998, not a lot of people had heard of OxyContin.
translation.it: Fino al 1998, in pochi avevano sentito parlare dell'OxyContin.

translation.en: Even if you had, you probably had no clue what it could do.
translation.it: E, nel caso, non sapevano cosa facesse.

translation.en: And that was the idea.
It was essential to Richard's plan.
translation.it: Era fondamentale per il piano di Richard.

translation.en: Now that the Sacklers had Purdue,
translation.it: Ora che i Sackler avevano la Purdue,

translation.en: they needed to find a drug they could sell.
translation.it: dovevano trovare un farmaco da vendere.

translation.en: A blockbuster.
And Richard was making a big bet on pain.
translation.it: Richard aveva scommesso grosso sul dolore.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, good boy.
Here you go, good boy.
Aren't you such a good boy?
Such a good boy. Are you ready?
Are you ready to make the donuts with me? Are you ready to make some money, Unchie?
translation.it: Sei pronto a fare le ciambelle? Sei pronto a fare soldi, Unchie?

translation.en: I love you so much.
That's it. That's it, boy. Come on, boy. Come on.
Good morning. Good morning.
Come on, boy. That's a good boy. You're a good boy.
You're such a good boy. I'll pick you up for now.
translation.it: Sei il più bravo. Vieni in braccio.

translation.en: But he wasn't starting from scratch.
For over 15 years, Purdue had been making and marketing
translation.it: Per più di 15 anni, la Purdue aveva pubblicizzato

translation.en: a morphine-based painkiller called MS Contin.
translation.it: un antidolorifico a base di morfina, l'MS Contin.

translation.en: So OxyContin just needed a little recipe tweaking.
translation.it: Bastava solo modificare la ricetta per l'OxyContin.

translation.en: [Kaiko] MS Contin has two elements.
Of course, there's the Contin,
our candy coating that dissolves slowly in the digestive tract...
translation.it: cioè il rivestimento che si dissolve nell'apparato digerente,

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -...which gives the system it's time-release property.
translation.it: permette un rilascio graduale del farmaco nel sistema.

translation.en: And then there's the milk chocolatey center,
morphine sulfate, MS--
And when we developed MS Contin,
was there any plan for a second generation?
-No. -Why not?
Because morphine works well.
It's well-understood
which made it relatively easy to get approval from the FDA.
translation.it: e quindi è più facile ottenere l'approvazione dell'FDA.

translation.en: Well, morphine is not the only opiate that works well.
translation.it: La morfina non è l'unico oppioide che funziona bene.

translation.en: It is the only opiate that's associated with death.
translation.it: È l'unico oppioide associato alla morte.

translation.en: I would like to make a painkiller that people associate
translation.it: Vorrei creare un antidolorifico che la gente associ

translation.en: with improved well-being, with life.
translation.it: a un miglioramento della qualità di vita.

translation.en: Let's make something new.
Can you do that?
This was the birth of a bad idea.
translation.it: Fu la nascita di una pessima idea.

translation.en: -Sure. -Then do it.
[Edie] They took one type of heroin wrapped in a time-release coating
translation.it: Hanno preso un tipo di eroina con un rivestimento a rilascio graduale

translation.en: and swapped it for a much stronger one.
translation.it: e l'hanno scambiato per uno più forte.

translation.en: [Arthur] I like it.
It's a little dangerous.
Be careful.
But I like it.
[woman 1] Okay...
I'll say a word
and you say the first thing that comes into your minds.
translation.it: e voi dite la prima cosa che vi viene in mente.

translation.en: Anyone can go first. All right.
Codeine.
[man 1] Dentist.
[man 2] Cough syrup.
[man 3] Wisdom teeth.
[woman 2] Sleep aid.
-[man 4] Fever. -[woman 1] Ah. Thank you.
Now, what about "morphine"?
[man 1] Death.
[man 3] Cancer.
[man 2] Addicts.
[woman 2] Severe pain.
All right, now tell me what words you associate with "oxycodone."
translation.it: Va bene, e quali parole associate al termine "ossicodone"?

translation.en: [man 3] Is... Is that Percocet?
[man 2] "Oxy", it's like a pulmonary thing.
translation.it: Il prefisso "ossi" mi ricorda i polmoni.

translation.en: [man 1] Like, oxygen?
Hey. What the hell?
Something the matter?
You see? You see, they all have an idea about morphine,
translation.it: Vedete? Hanno tutti un'idea precisa sulla morfina,

translation.en: but oxycodone is a clean slate.
Nobody has any associations with it. We can make it whatever we want.
translation.it: Non hanno pregiudizi. Possiamo farlo essere ciò che vogliamo.

translation.en: So you want to take a drug with twice the kick of morphine
translation.it: Perciò vuoi prendere un farmaco con dose doppia di morfina

translation.en: and give it to everybody?
Yes. Yes, I do.
Abuse is gonna be a real issue.
[both] When a patient is under the supervision of their physician,
translation.it: Se un paziente è seguito da un medico,

translation.en: these drugs are incredibly safe.
translation.it: questo farmaco è del tutto sicuro.

translation.en: If I may, I don't think that's entirely accurate.
translation.it: Non credo sia del tutto accurato.

translation.en: -Even with MS Contin, we saw abuse of-- -[Raymond] Yes, yes, yes. All right.
translation.it: - Anche con l'MS Contin, l'abuso… - Sì, va bene. Certo.

translation.en: So we are going to take a very powerful drug
and put it into the hands of potentially millions of new people?
translation.it: e distribuirla potenzialmente a milioni di persone?

translation.en: Yes. Yes, that's right.
Under the care of their physician.
And with full FDA approval.
Here.
Look at this.
Doctors currently prescribe morphine here
translation.it: I medici ora prescrivono la morfina qui

translation.en: because morphine is death.
translation.it: perché la morfina equivale alla morte.

translation.en: But with oxycodone, our new patients are here.
translation.it: Ma con l'ossicodone, i pazienti sarebbero qui.

translation.en: [Edie] This is the moment
I think this whole thing could've been stopped.
If Raymond or Mortimer or anyone else had just said no,
translation.it: Se Raymond, Mortimer o chi per loro avesse detto di no,

translation.en: you and I would not be talking
and there would be a lot of people at dinner with their families right now.
translation.it: e molte persone farebbero ancora cena in famiglia.

translation.en: I know you're scared. I know you're concerned.
translation.it: So che siete preoccupati e spaventati.

translation.en: This story is a tragedy.
But we're gonna give a lot of people their lives back.
translation.it: Restituiremo la vita a molte persone.

translation.en: We're gonna take away a lot of pain.
What do we call it?
The drug you never knew you needed.
translation.it: Il farmaco di cui hai bisogno.

translation.en: The drug you never knew you needed.
translation.it: Il farmaco di cui hai bisogno.

translation.en: [Edie] Richard had his designer drug.
translation.it: Richard aveva creato una droga sintetica.

translation.en: What do you think?
OxyContin was born.
Richard had his big idea:
a drug that people in need could not refuse.
translation.it: un farmaco che i malati non potevano rifiutare.

translation.en: And that was only half the plan, and not even the worst half.
translation.it: E questa era solo una metà del piano, e neanche la peggiore.

translation.en: This is where Uncle Arthur's influence came in.
translation.it: Fu qui che entrò in gioco l'influenza dello zio Arthur.

translation.en: He was a salesman
and knew your product is only as good as the message it comes with.
translation.it: e sapeva che un prodotto vende se associato a un bel messaggio.

translation.en: Richard knew exactly what that message was,
translation.it: Richard sapeva benissimo qual era quel messaggio

translation.en: and more importantly, how to send it.
He went about putting together a sales force
to get the word out about OxyContin.
They recruited good-looking college graduates
who could speak a doctor's language,
translation.it: che sapevano usare il linguaggio medico

translation.en: and then they programmed the shit out of them.
translation.it: e poi li programmarono come robot.

translation.en: [Britt] Temperature, heart rate, respiratory rate, and blood pressure.
translation.it: Temperatura, battito cardiaco, frequenza respiratoria e pressione.

translation.en: These are known as the vital signs. Do you know what is not a vital sign?
translation.it: Questi sono i parametri vitali. Sapete cosa non lo è?

translation.en: Pain.
Pain is the last thing a medical professional will consider
translation.it: Il dolore è l'ultima cosa che un medico prende in considerazione

translation.en: when they care for you.
Or your grandmother.
Or your boyfriend.
-[Shannon] Hello, Frank. -Shannon.
Pain has long been understood to be a symptom of injury or disease,
translation.it: Il dolore è sempre stato trattato come un sintomo di una ferita o malattia,

translation.en: not something to treat in and of itself.
translation.it: non come qualcosa da curare per conto suo.

translation.en: [woman] Hey! So, you're just gonna sit there and eat Cap'n Crunch all day?
translation.it: Ehi! Vuoi rimanere lì seduto tutto il giorno?

translation.en: Finish the car.
-[Frank] When I'm done. -[woman] When you're done?
Three full bowls of fucking Cap'n Crunch.
translation.it: Sei alla terza tazza di cereali.

translation.en: -[Frank] Tires ain't going nowhere. -[woman] You're a degenerate.
translation.it: - Le gomme non scappano. - Sei un coglione.

translation.en: You're gonna blow up my toilets with that Cap'n Crunch.
translation.it: Mi intaserai il cesso a forza di cereali.

translation.en: -It's disgusting! I'm taking it. -I'm playing.
[woman] I'm taking it and turning it off. Get out, go on.
translation.it: Ora te lo spengo. Forza, fuori.

translation.en: [Britt] Doctors don't respect pain.
translation.it: I medici non rispettano il dolore.

translation.en: -Because they don't understand it. -["Sabotage" playing]
translation.it: PURDUE - BRITT HUFFORD RESPONSABILE VENDITE Perché non lo capiscono.

translation.en: A medical education is what, seven years?
translation.it: Una laurea in medicina dura sette anni?

translation.en: Do you know how much direct instruction medical students receive on pain?
translation.it: Sapete quanto tempo dedicano allo studio del dolore?

translation.en: Forty-eight minutes.
Patients don't need to adjust their lives to deal with pain.
translation.it: I pazienti non devono adeguarsi per sopportare il dolore.

translation.en: Doctors need to adjust their treatment of it.
translation.it: Semmai sono i medici a dover adeguare le cure.

translation.en: Pain is no longer something that we have to tolerate.
translation.it: Il dolore non è più una cosa da tollerare.

translation.en: It is something we can overcome.
-Hi. -Here you go.
My name is Shannon.
-Thank you. -[man] You got it.
We have a way to overcome it.
We have an answer.
OxyContin.
That's the answer.
If you're a good fit for us,
translation.it: Se siete adatti al caso nostro,

translation.en: you will join our crusade to help change the way Americans deal with their pain.
translation.it: vi unirete alla nostra crociata per cambiare il modo di gestire il dolore.

translation.en: At Purdue, we've spent years developing OxyContin.
translation.it: Alla Purdue, abbiamo passato anni a sviluppare l'OxyContin.

translation.en: An effective, long lasting and safe treatment for pain
translation.it: Una cura per il dolore efficacie, duratura e sicura

translation.en: with broad application to a wide range of patients.
But you'll have to do more than sell this treatment.
translation.it: Ma dovrete fare di più che vendere questo farmaco.

translation.en: You will be convincing doctors to take pain seriously.
translation.it: Dovrete convincere i medici a prendere il dolore sul serio.

translation.en: Make no mistake.
You will be part of a beautiful, glorious,
translation.it: Farete parte di una bella, fantastica e gloriosa rivoluzione

translation.en: wonderful revolution of life transformation.

You're fine.
Okay?
-Look at me. -I just can't stop laughing.
translation.it: - Guardami. - Non riesco a smettere di ridere.

translation.en: I know. You're gonna be fine.
That's the best view in Ohio.
Here's your bedroom.
Make yourself at home.
translation.it: Fa' come fossi a casa tua.

translation.en: And use all those drawers, they're all yours.
-It's great. -I hope you like purple.
translation.it: - Stupenda. - Spero ti piaccia il viola.

translation.en: Yeah, I love purple.
This is our bathroom, we'll share it.
Toilet, steam shower.
That bath tub is amazing.
And that's a Moroccan Rose bath oil, you can use it.
translation.it: E questo è olio da bagno marocchino, usalo pure.

translation.en: This is the living room, obviously, and up there is the private roof deck
translation.it: Questo è il salone, ovviamente, e lassù c'è il terrazzo

translation.en: with a killer fucking Jacuzzi.
You got a car?
Uh, yeah, it's my mom's, but I'm using it right now.
translation.it: Sì, di mia madre, ma la uso io ora.

translation.en: All right, we'll get you a parking permit.
translation.it: Ok, ti procureremo un permesso per il parcheggio.

translation.en: -Do you have cash? -Not so much.
We'll get you some cash.
This is a big fucking day.
Yeah.
Let's celebrate.
-You like champagne? -Yeah.
Cheers.
Thank you.
To your new life, Shannon Shaeffer.
translation.it: A una nuova vita, Shannon Shaeffer.

translation.en: You've never had champagne, have you?
Here.
Hey, I just really-- I wanna thank you for this opportunity--
translation.it: Ehi, senti. Vorrei ringraziarti per questa opportunità…

translation.en: First thing we gotta do is fix this. You look like a show pony.
translation.it: Per prima cosa, dobbiamo sistemarti. Sembri un pony.

translation.en: We gotta get you some new clothes.
Smell this.
-Are you serious? -Yeah. Smell it.
It's imported leather from Italy. What's that smell like?
translation.it: È pelle italiana. Di cosa sa?

translation.en: -Oh, imported leather from Italy. -No.
It smells like money.
Smell it again.
Yeah, it's good.
Oh, you have amazing legs.
You have a great figure.
-I don't know about that. -You're hot as shit.
-Step right in. Lily, Glen. -Thank you for seeing us so quickly.
translation.it: - Prego. Lily, Glen. - Grazie per la visita.

translation.en: I'm glad to see you always.
So, how are you doing, champ?
Not so great.
[Hartman] It doesn't look like it.
-Feeling pretty rough? -You could say that.
translation.it: - Ti senti male? - Puoi dirlo forte.

translation.en: Okay. Well, have a look at this chart.
On a scale of one to 10, where would you say your pain is?
translation.it: Da uno a dieci, dove classificheresti il tuo dolore.

translation.en: -I'd say a five or s-- -No, it's a nine.
translation.it: - Direi cinque o s… - No, nove.

translation.en: He's feeling like crap and he's not sleeping, which means that I'm not sleeping.
translation.it: Sta di merda e non dorme, e, di conseguenza, neanche io.

translation.en: -So... -Not sleeping.
Yeah. Whatever you gave me is not working anymore.
translation.it: Sì. I farmaci non funzionano più.

translation.en: No? I gave you Vicodin. It's pretty standard.
translation.it: No? Ti ho dato il Vicodin. È un farmaco comune.

translation.en: But I'd like to start you on something new.
translation.it: Ma vorrei farti provare un nuovo farmaco.

translation.en: It's called OxyContin.
It's similar to Vicodin,
but it lasts a full 12 hours without wearing off.
translation.it: ma dura 12 ore senza che l'effettuo diminuisca.

translation.en: -That would be good. -All right, so...
you will take one in the morning.
You'll take one before you go to bed,
translation.it: E una prima di andare a letto.

translation.en: so there will be no waking up in the middle of the night in pain.
translation.it: Così non ti sveglierai di notte in preda ai dolori.

translation.en: -And I'll get some sleep? -[Hartman] The best.
-We'll all get sleep. -You will both get the best sleep ever.
translation.it: - Dormiremo tutti. - Farete sogni mai fatti.

translation.en: -It's safe? Okay. -As safe as any other opioid.
translation.it: - È sicuro? Ok. - Come tutti gli altri oppioidi.

translation.en: The good news is, you don't have to take it as often.
translation.it: Ma non devi prenderlo altrettanto spesso.

translation.en: -Okay. -[Hartman] All right?
-[Lily] Let's try it. -I trust you, Doc.
Get out of here. Go sleep, go sleep better.
Oh, oh, Glen.
I should warn you there is one possible side effect.
translation.it: Ti avviso. Ha un effetto collaterale.

translation.en: -What? -[in German accent] The constipation.
Yeah?
-All right. -[in normal voice] Go sleep.
I think we can handle that.
All right. Constipation.
I need to speak to Dr. Coyle, please.
-And you are? -Edie Flowers.
Oh, fuck me.
You motherfucker.
So, I asked you if there was anything else I needed to know, and you said no, right?
translation.it: Le ho chiesto se dovessi sapere altro e lei mi ha detto di no, giusto?

translation.en: -Yeah. Right. -You're not being honest with me.
translation.it: - Sì. Giusto. - Lei non è sincero con me.

translation.en: -I told you everything. Everything. -You prescribed a new drug,
translation.it: Le ho detto tutto. Ha prescritto un farmaco,

translation.en: one I've never even heard of, 1,098 times in six months.
translation.it: di cui non ho mai sentito parlare, 1098 volte in sei mesi.

translation.en: That's more prescriptions than there are patients, and nearly 5% of Carroll County.
translation.it: Le prescrizioni superano i pazienti, è quasi il 5% di Carroll County.

translation.en: What we both know is that those patients don't exist
translation.it: Sappiamo entrambi che questi pazienti non esistono

translation.en: and that you are running some dumb, idiotic, little stupid jackass scheme.
translation.it: e che sta gestendo un affare losco, stupido e da idioti.

translation.en: Now, I gave you a chance.
Now it's gonna hurt.
translation.it: Ma ora si farà del male.

translation.en: Okay. Just wait a second, okay?
Dr. Coyle, what can you tell me about OxyContin?
translation.it: Dott. Coyle, cosa sa dirmi dell'OxyContin?

translation.en: What Purdue did, what Richard Sackler did,
translation.it: Ciò che la Purdue ha fatto, che Richard Sackler ha fatto,

translation.en: abusing the trust between a doctor and their patient...
translation.it: ovvero abusare della fiducia tra medico e paziente…

translation.en: selling hope to the most vulnerable people,
that's sick on a whole other level.
translation.it: è una cosa folle e inaudita!

translation.en: And then Richard Sackler combined two of the most addictive substances:
translation.it: Richard Sackler ha mescolato le due sostanze che più creano dipendenza:

translation.en: greed and opium.
And when you understand that...
When you understand that,
then your brain will never be able to reconcile it.
translation.it: non riuscirete più a concepire una cosa simile.

translation.en: And you will never see the world the same.
translation.it: Non vedrete più il mondo come prima.
